\NeedsTeXFormat{LaTeX2e}
\documentclass{minimal}
\usepackage{qstest}
\IncludeTests{*}
\LogTests{log}{*}{*}
\usepackage{pdflscape}[2008/08/11]
\begin{document}
\begin{qstest}{checkangle}{checkangle}
  \makeatletter
  \def\Result{%
    \def\ResultString{\the\count@}%
  }%
  \def\PackageError#1#2#3{%
    \def\Result{%
      \def\ResultString{error}%
    }%
  }%
  \def\Test#1#2{%
    \begingroup
      \PLS@CheckAngle{#1}%
      \Result
      \Expect*{\ResultString}{#2}%
    \endgroup
  }%
  \Test{0}{0}%
  \Test{90}{90}%
  \Test{180}{180}%
  \Test{270}{270}%
  \Test{360}{0}%
  \Test{450}{90}%
  \Test{540}{180}%
  \Test{630}{270}%
  \Test{720}{0}%
  \Test{3600}{0}%
  \Test{3690}{90}%
  \Test{-90}{270}%
  \Test{-180}{180}%
  \Test{-270}{-90}%
  \Test{-360}{0}%
  \Test{-450}{270}%
  \Test{540}{180}%
  \Test{-630}{90}%
  \Test{-720}{0}%
  \Test{-3600}{0}%
  \Test{-3690}{270}%
  \Test{1}{error}%
  \Test{-1}{error}%
  \Test{123}{error}%
\end{qstest}
\end{document}
\endinput
